Title: AN ACT TO AMEND SECTION ONE OF ACT NUMBERED THIRTY-FOUR HUNDRED AND FIFTY-FIVE, CHANGING THE NAMES OF CERTAIN STREETS OF THE MUNICIPALITY OF TACLOBAN, PROVINCE OF LEYTE.
Data:
[ Act No. 3752, November 26, 1930 ]
AN ACT TO AMEND SECTION ONE OF ACT NUMBERED THIRTY-FOUR HUNDRED AND FIFTY-FIVE, CHANGING THE NAMES OF CERTAIN STREETS OF THE MUNICIPALITY OF TACLOBAN, PROVINCE OF LEYTE.
Be it enacted by the Senate and House of Representatives of the Philippines in Legislature assembled and by the authority of the same:
Section 1. Section one of Act Numbered Thirty-four hundred and fifty-five is hereby amended to read as follows:
"Section 1. The names of the streets of the municipality of Tacloban, Province of Leyte, hereinafter named are hereby replaced by the following: Calle Colon by Paseo de Colon, San Fernando by Avenida Magallanes, San Juan by Juan Luna, Job by P. Paterno, Malcampo by M. H. del Pilar, Gumersindo by Purisima Concepcion, San Roque by San Roque, Amparo by P. Gomez, Paseo del Carmen by P. Gomez (extension), Pelayo. by Trece Martires, Guzman by Presidente Wilson, Pizarro by Lopez Jaena, Rizal by Avenida Rizal, all of Calle Rizal and Calle Gran Capitan, to the intersection of Calles Real and Gran Capitan, San Jose by Perikohon, Allen by Jones, Sevilla by T. Claudio, Santa Filomena by F. Torres, Zaragoza by Independencia, Bailon by C. Arellano, Gerona by General Lukban, and Calle Nueva or Veloso by Avenida Veteranos de la Revolucion."
Section 2. This Act shall take effect on its approval.1a—àphi1
Approved, November 26, 1930.
